page.title: 19KILMARNOCK IN 2086
page.content: This is what I think life will be like in 2086. People will have a computerised home. E.g. a control button to lock doors and windows. Crime will grow at an alarming rate. People will have lazer lights across doors and windows to prevent burglaries. Vandalism will be worse and I think there will be much more spray paint over the walls. More people will be divorced and more children will be taken into care. People will travel in cars which have videos and push buttons for food. The 5p coin will have disappeared. Roads will be much bigger. There will be a lot more pollution. I think 2086 will be worse than 1986.
